metadata.name: Insecure Proxy/DOH Transfer Via Curl.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "insecure" flag over proxy or DOH.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\curl.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('curl.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--doh-insecure')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--proxy-insecure'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "insecure" flag over proxy or DOH.

metadata.objective: False positive: Access to badly maintained internal or development systems Reference: https://curl.se/docs/manpage.html
